title: Clovis Goods 21S0301-40, 40 x 32 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)
item_description:
Clovis Goods 21S0301-40, 40 x 32 Inch Rectangular Frameless LED Bathroom Mirror (NEW)

  • Specifications:
  • Material: Glass
  • Shape: Rectangle
  • Weight: 25.4 lbs
  • 120VAC
  • 60Hz
  • 74W
  • Condition: NEW
  • Dimensions:
  • Width: 40 Inch
  • Thickness: 1 1/4 Inch
  • Height: 32 Inch
  • Features:
  • The horizontal outline LED border lights to add soft illumination, making your reflection and smile brighter and clearer
  • This LED bathroom mirror light is dimmable and controlled with a touch-sensor switch
    3 color temperature 3000K-6000K dimmable illuminates with a CRI of more than 95
    LED lifetime - 50,000 hours (Using the mirror 3 hours a day means it will last 45 years
  • The brightness settings are automatically stored, so you don't need to adjust the brightness every time

Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
